voice_automation_specific.audio_handling: Always use context managers for audio resources

voice_automation_specific.privacy_compliance: No audio data persistence without explicit consent
voice_automation_specific.error_recovery: Graceful degradation when voice recognition fails

optimization_targets.plugin_isolation: No plugin can impact core performance >10%

performance_testing.memory_profiling: Track leaks during extended plugin usage
performance_testing.audio_quality: Test with various microphones and environments

voice_automation_context.audio_processing_awareness: Understand audio pipeline, codecs, sampling rates

voice_automation_context.privacy_considerations: Always consider data retention, user consent, local processing
voice_automation_context.user_experience_focus: Prioritize response latency, accuracy, and natural interaction

scf_commands.time: Intelligent token usage estimate with capacity warnings
scf_commands.rules: List active rules and behavioral guidelines
scf_commands.closeout: Provide updated buildstate file for session end
scf_commands.voice: Show voice automation specific context and considerations
scf_commands.performance: Display current performance metrics and optimization status

domain_expertise.voice_recognition: ASR engines, accuracy optimization, noise handling
domain_expertise.audio_processing: Real-time processing, buffer management, format conversion
domain_expertise.desktop_integration: System APIs, window management, keyboard/mouse control
domain_expertise.plugin_ecosystems: API design, security sandboxing, lifecycle management

privacy_by_design.data_minimization: Only process audio when explicitly activated
privacy_by_design.local_processing: All voice recognition runs locally by default
privacy_by_design.user_consent: Explicit opt-in for any cloud processing or data sharing
privacy_by_design.data_retention: Configurable audio retention policies (default: no retention)

plugin_security.sandboxing: Plugins run in isolated environments with limited system access
plugin_security.permission_system: Granular permissions for file system, network, system APIs
plugin_security.runtime_monitoring: Monitor plugin behavior for suspicious activity

system_security.encrypted_config: User profiles and sensitive settings encrypted at rest

accessibility.voice_commands: Full keyboard alternative for all voice features
accessibility.visual_feedback: Clear status indicators for all voice states
accessibility.error_recovery: Helpful error messages with suggested corrections
accessibility.customization: Adjustable voice sensitivity, command aliases, shortcuts

onboarding.command_discovery: Interactive tutorial for available voice commands
onboarding.privacy_education: Clear explanation of data handling and privacy controls

power_user_features.command_chaining: Chain multiple voice commands in sequence
power_user_features.macro_recording: Record and replay complex voice command sequences
power_user_features.profile_switching: Quick switching between different user profiles/contexts
power_user_features.advanced_customization: Custom wake words, command triggers, response behaviors
